name: Squid and Bun
description:
You're a Squid and your girlfriend Bun has abducted by evil forces.

Go defeat the enemies and rescue her now!

Controls

  • Move : ↑/↓/←/→
  • Attack : Z
  • Jump : X
  • Dash : C
  • Skill 1 : L_Shift
  • Skill 2 : L_Ctrl
  • Item : 1 / 2 / 3

Tips

  • Press ↑ to enter the gate.
  • Attack is automatically switched to melee/range by distance.
  • Press dash with arrows.
  • Double jump(+jump and dash) is available.

Credits

  • Wallpapers art by Arnid Xiong
  • Tilemap sprites by Kenney

Dedicated to my best friend and lover, Arnid.
